author: mmusich
body:
#### PR description:

Part of the migration in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/36404
Went systematically through all of the CMSDEPRECATED_X warnings in the `SLHCUpgradeSimulations/Geometry`  subsystem from `CMSSW_12_3_CMSDEPRECATED_X_2021-12-15-2300` and removed deprecated API calls.
Bonus:
   * merged header files in plugins implementations

#### PR validation:

`cmssw` compiles

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

N/A
title: get rid of CMSDEPRECATED_X warnings in `SLHCUpgradeSimulations/Geometry`
